attributes.action: Life Sentance for the possession of a dangerous weapon
attributes.additional_details:
A deadly weapon, sometimes dangerous weapon, is a statutory definition listing certain items which can inflict mortal or great bodily harm.

There is no credible reasons that a person should be in possession of a dangerous weapon and the possession of one should carry the maximum prison sentance of life.

This would act as a huge deterrent to those who feel that carrying such a weapon is vital in the potection of ones self in this day and age.
